Room.Name: Balcony Over Gaming Lounge
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the balcony overlooking the gaming lounge.
Room.LongDescription: Many mages have come here to witness the slaughter of prisoners who have disobeyed the mages or intruded on the palace. There are many interested third parties here as well who may be interested in hiring mages for their adventures. To the northeast, you can see the great sorceress who is guarded by many of here elite palace guards.
